Text: Re ISDA Master Agreement prepared by Enron North America Cc Confirming receipt of the draft Schedule and the Credit Support Annex to the ISDA Master Agreement I have talked to Joe Gordon this afternoon regarding the credit collateral issues It is my understanding that Enron would prefer to have the agreement in place we would hold back on transactions pending further credit discussions with Ed Sacks I am out of town on Thursday Friday I will touch base with you on Monday Thanks again for your assistance in this regard Jim Delani Energy New England

Re ISDA Master Agreement prepared by Enron North America Cc Confirming receipt of the draft Schedule and the Credit Support Annex to the ISDA Master Agreement I have talked to Joe Gordon this afternoon regarding the credit collateral issues It is my understanding that Enron would prefer to have the agreement in place we would hold back on transactions pending further credit discussions with Ed Sacks I am out of town on Thursday Friday I will touch base with you on Monday Thanks again for your assistance in this regard Jim Delani Energy New England
